entry.title: Mill Valley FPV Drone Project
entry.content:
Part of the reason that I started the Mill Valley Code Club was to give me an outlet to do stuff that would otherwise seem totally ridiculous.

I have this idea that I could build a quadrocopter with a GoPro, that could fly from the Mill Valley Square, up to the top of Mount Tamalpais.

It would have a GoPro attached and we could get a First Person View (FPV) of that trip.

Not sure if the quadrocopter has that kind of range.

As I learn more about how this goes, I’ll post using the mvcopter category.

If you are interested in helping out, let me know! I’ll probably working on this at the Mill Valley Code Club every once in a while.
